title: Aelwyn's 1-70 Horde Leveling Guide
description:
Aelwyn&#039;s World of Warcraft 1-70 Horde Leveling Guide
----------------------------------------------------

Dubbed as &#039;THE LEVELING GUIDE&#039;, Aelwyn&#039;s guide does right where Joanna&#039;s guide went terribly wrong. This guide is an addon, used 100% ingame, hence the file size.

Retails for $AUD29.95 - now brought to you, cracked and activation-free, for nothing.

Features:
* 100% in-game, no more alt-tabbing or printouts
* Automatically sets and clears waypoints.
* No cluttered map with thousands of POI&#039;s
* No searching through thousands of POI&#039;s on your map
  or endless lists to find your next step or current position.
* Minimap arrow pointing you to your next waypoint
* Custom made 3d arrow to direct you to the next waypoint.
* Simple step-by-step structure.
* No thinking, no typing, everything is automatic.
* Simple and easy to use...

Scanned for viruses at virustotal.com: http://img385.imageshack.us/img385/6932/virusscannb3.png

To install, simply extract to /World of Warcraft/Interface/Addons/.
You also may need to insure "Load out-of-date addons" is checked.

Latest version as of April 1, 2008. Stay tuned for updates.
